body.title: COVID-19 Ontario Schools Events and Updates

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.span: Ontario Schools COVID-19 Updates and Events

strong.span: All schools will be closed Monday 3/16/20 through Friday 5/29/20

div.a: Ontario Schools COVID-19 Updates and events. Please click here for updates. This page is updated hourly.

div.h1: COVID-19 Ontario Schools Events and Updates

div.span: Our Board of Education Office will be open 8am - 2pm Mon. - Thurs., and closed on Fridays. Student's will be able to swap their Chromebook in the Board Office if needed.

a.span: Director of Education COVI-19 Instructional Update 3/31/2020

span.div: All Ontario Schools will be closed starting Monday 3/16/20 through Friday 5/29/20.

span.a: To view the letter please click here

div.h3: Ontario Schools Closure: Student Meal Form

span.div: Please fill out the the following form by Monday, 4/27/20 at 9am. You will not be required to fill out this form daily. Please fill out the form only once.

li.span: Non-School Sponsored Events that use our facilities, such as travel teams, girls scouts, clubs, outside organizations -
City of Ontario Summer Rec Program -
the week of June 8th and June 15th cancelled

p.span: This page is being updated hourly. Please check back frequently.

a.span: How Long Does the Coronavirus Live on Surfaces 3/30/20
Director's Order - Stay At Home Orders 3/24/20
CDC COVID-19 Guidance for K-12 Schools

p.span: This is a quickly evolving situation that changes every day. The most up to date information can be found at
